sentence: Hostage  Inbar  Haiman,  27,  killed  by  Hamas  -  hostage  forum.

article_title: Hostage Inbar Haiman, 27, killed by Hamas - hostage forum.
sentence: Inbar  Haiman,  a  27-year-old  Israeli  hostage  who  was  abducted  on  7  October,  has  been  killed  by  Hamas,  the  Hostages  and  Missing  Persons  Families  Forum  says.
